testcase.name: The notification list on the navbar displays the product
testcase.system-out: Given the seller is logged in QAE10_GR03_seller@binar.com 4IKJKomARpjPH7aiyRZ0CQ==.passed When clicks on the "Notifikasi" button......................................passed Then the notification on the navbar displays the product name, price Rp 5.000.000 and offer amount Rp 3.000.000.passed

testcase.name: The notification list page displays the product
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks on the "Penawaran produk" notification...............passed Then the notification list displays the product name, price Rp 5.000.000 and offer amount Rp 3.000.000.passed

testcase.name: Seller rejects a product offer
testcase.system-out: When the seller clicks on the "Tolak" button................................passed Then the the negotiated product item displays "Penawaran produk ditolak" text.passed
